name: Axiom Monsoon Oceanweave P12+ City Seat Pack
categories: Monsoon Oceanweave P12+ City Seat Pack
description:
Commute or tour in the rain, knowing your gear will remain dry. The Monsoon Onceanweave Seat Pack is highly waterproof and spacious, with plenty of reflective elements and a place to attach a light for visibility. Easy on-off hardware is a breeze to use when coming or going.Polyurethane-coated Oceanweave® fabric made with reclaimed fishnets.Hydracore® liner provides IPX5 waterproofness.Internal side stiffeners and foam stabilizers.Rixen & Kaul® attachment system with 2 seatpost clamps.Fits seatposts 25-32mm and 32-36mm in diameter.Roll-top and compression straps keep the load nice and tight.Built-in U-lock holder and bungee storage system.Not advised for carbon fibre posts.

        Sustainability
